remove boosters

Removing orbital mechanics is a bad, bad, bad, idea! Simplify them, instead. For instance: when you thrust prograde, stay at the same height, but go faster. When you RCS, have the entire orbit move in the thrust direction. Also, because you need to go faster to get there, higher orbits should take less time to complete than lower one.
quick time events, because we all love quick time events (at least game devs seem to think we do)

Change the keybindings so Space is abort and T is stage.
I think it would be good to make the oceans on Kerbin highly corrosive so any parts that land in the ocean instantly vaporize.
